snippet: The estate holds the rights to the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King’s image, and the family wants input concerning plans for a monument, its representatives told the governor.
lead_paragraph: The estate holds the rights to the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King’s image, and the family wants input concerning plans for a monument, its representatives told the governor.

headline.main: Family Wants Say in New King Memorial
headline.print_headline: Family Wants Say in New King Memorial
